text: K. V. Chowdary is an officer of the 1978 batch of Indian Revenue Service (IRS). He assumed the charge as Central Vigilance Commissioner on 10 June 2015. He has served as Chairman of the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT). In 2015 he was appointed as the chairman of Central Vigilance Commission. He has been appointed as a member of the board directors of Reliance Industries in october 2019 ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Indian Revenue Service officers Category:People from Machilipatnam
